metadata.title: CVE-2024-2606 on Ubuntu Pro FIPS-updates 18.04 LTS (bionic) - medium
metadata.description: Passing invalid data could have led to invalid wasm values being created,such as arbitrary integers turning into pointer values. This vulnerabilityaffects Firefox < 124.

criterions.comment: mozjs38: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue.
mozjs52: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue.
